name: Squirrel Girl

abilities.name: Nut Launch
abilities.details: Fires nuts rapidly from wrist-mounted launchers.

abilities.name: Squirrel Leap
abilities.details: Performs an agile leap forward. Can cling to walls briefly after.

abilities.name: Tippy-Toe's Toss
abilities.details: Throws her companion squirrel, Tippy-Toe. Tippy attacks the nearest enemy for several seconds.

ultimate.name: Squirrelpocalypse
ultimate.effect: Summons a massive horde of squirrels that swarm enemies in an area, dealing continuous damage.
ultimate.details: Unleashes an overwhelming squirrel assault. Lasts ~6 seconds.

passives.name: Squirrel Friend
passives.details: Tippy-Toe assists passively by highlighting nearby enemies occasionally?

passives.name: Wall Cling/Jump
passives.details: Can briefly cling to and jump off walls.

lore: Doreen Green possesses superhuman agility, strength, and the ability to communicate with squirrels. Despite her quirky powers, she is surprisingly effective and has defeated major threats, earning the title 'The Unbeatable Squirrel Girl'.

comics.title: Marvel Super-Heroes Winter Special (1991 - First Appearance)
